#summary 信息提取
#labels free,cms,freecms,java,开源,免费,内容管理系统

= 信息提取=
<p>
	<strong>从FreeCMS 1.4 开始支持</strong></p>
<p>
	从左侧管理菜单点击信息提取进入。</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084123_NFbn_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084123_NFbn_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	默认提取所有信息，可以选择站点、栏目、信息关键字进行搜索。</p>
<p>
	选择需要提取的信息，点击"提取到栏目"按钮。</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084140_NN9K_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084140_NN9K_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	选择需要提取到的栏目，如"要点"<span>.</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084157_rmzf_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084157_rmzf_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	点击"确定"。</p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-style: italic; font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">从FreeCMS 1.</span><span style="font-style: italic; font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold">5</span><span style="font-style: italic; font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt; font-weight: bold"> 开始支持</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1016/075955_05tA_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1016/075955_05tA_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1016/080015_cVI6_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/1016/080015_cVI6_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">如果目标栏目设置了"</span><span style="font-family: 'Arial'; font-size: 10.5pt">当此栏目中的信息变更后</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">"</span><span style="font-family: '宋体'; font-size: 10.5pt">所需要进行的静态化操作，则系统会自动进行静态化。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084211_G8Hn_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084211_G8Hn_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	提取成功，可以进入"要点"栏目查看到提取的信息。</p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084232_5bMM_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2013/0706/084232_5bMM_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
